summary: very simple sound overhaul of the main menu
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]
[color=#e69138][size=5]DRAKENSANG[/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=5]  [/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5][color=#666666][size=3][color=#999999][size=5]The Dark Eye[/size][/color]
[/size][/color][/size][/size][/color][/font]Classics for Main Menu[/size][/size][size=4][size=5] Sound
[/size][/size][/color][/font][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][i]I have created this mod originally only for myself. But I think you also like this.[/i][/font][/size][/color][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]


[img]http://www.derpas-mata.de/Wallpaper_Drakensang_01_1680x1050.jpg[/img]
Drakensang: The Dark Eye (German title: Das Schwarze Auge: Drakensang) is a 2008 role-playing video game developed by Radon Labs and published by dtp.




[/size][/color][/font][/i][font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3]Main File I:[/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5]Drakensang - "[size=4][i]Auf zu neuen Welten[/i][/size]"[/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]
[/size][/size][/color][/font]a music replacer for the main menu
[/size][/color][/font][/i][youtube]PQvqht-D6_k[/youtube]

[font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3]Main File II:[/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5]Drakensang - "[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][i]Ferdok Theme[/i][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5]"[/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]
[/size][/size][/color][/font]a music replacer for the main menu
[/size][/color][/font][/i][youtube]l0pVM0n3Jz0[/youtube]
[i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3]Main File III:[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5]Drakensang - "[/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][i]Prehnshain[/i][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5]"[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]
[/size][/size][/color][/font][i]a music replacer for the main menu[/i][/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[youtube]7srKzUqSkCM[/youtube]







[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3][color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.

[color=#999999]C:\Program Files\Bethesda Softworks\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\Data\music\special\mus_maintheme.xwm
[/color][/color][/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i]
[i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3]The sound is intentionally set a little quieter.
[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3]Only install one version!
[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i]
[color=#666666][i][font=Georgia][size=3][i][size=3][size=3][i]You like it?  Do not forget to endorsed me[color=#999999].[/color][/i][/size][/size][/i][/size][/font][/i][/color][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3]
